entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
